/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -pthread -g   CMakeFiles/demo1.dir/src/play.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demo1.dir/src/packetqueue.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demo1.dir/src/videocode.cpp.o CMakeFiles/demo1.dir/src/framequeue.cpp.o  -o demo1  -L/  -L/libswresample  -L/libavformat  -L/libavcodec  -L/libavfilter  -L/libavutil  -L/libswscale  -L/usr/include/SDL2 -rpath -lavformat -lavcodec -lavutil -lavfilter -lswscale -lswresample -lSDL2 -lSDL2main -Wl,-rpath,/:/libswresample:/libavformat:/libavcodec:/libavfilter:/libavutil:/libswscale:/usr/include/SDL2
